column4: help for a noob please .. i have finally somehow got something outta this ubuntu .. i can access the internet with xchat .. but nothing else
scrap that request for help ...
there seems to be only certain things i can't access on the net with firefox
anyone got ideas on why that it?
is?
most websites
maybe you have ecn turned on?
what is in the file /proc/sys/net/ipv4/tcp
different problem, then. can you ping the same sites?
yes
do you have a web proxy turned on?
Edit->Preferences->General->Connection
but you can ping hotmail?
try another browser?
not sure i follow you. the browser is on the local machine?
and it doesn't work either?
is hotmail the only site you can't reach? maybe a certificate problem?
all right, i'm officially baffled. maybe the problem is the underlying network?
do you have a firewall between you and the outside world?
maybe outgoing http is blocked to certain sites
though it admittedly seems rather random
hmm. sorry, without seeing the machine directly, i'm out of things to try
